name: Cryptstalker Spaulders
tooltip:
Cryptstalker SpauldersLevel 60

Huntsman Leopold at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make Cryptstalker Spaulders if you bring him the following: 1 Desecrated Spaulders, 12 Wartorn Chain Scraps, 2 Arcanite Bars and 3 Cured Rugged Hides.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Spaulders
- Wartorn Chain Scrap x 12
- Arcanite Bar x 2
- Cured Rugged Hide x 3
